title: Of Beans and Bunnies feat. Efren Ramirez
dc:creator: WBUR
description: Efren Ramirez (Napoleon Dynamite, Lightyear) portrays a beloved trickster who lives by his wits—and uses them to outwit others—in this folktale from the Spanish-speaking world.
